# NSCoder.DecodingFailurePolicy.raiseException

**Case**

A failure policy that directs the coder to raise an exception.

## Declaration

```swift
case raiseException
```

## Discussion

With this policy, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder] raises an exception internally to propagate failure messages (and unwind the stack). In Objective-C, this exception can be transformed into an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] via methods like [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder/decodeTopLevelObjectAndReturnError:]

## Failure Policies

- **NSCoder.DecodingFailurePolicy.setErrorAndReturn**: A failure policy that directs the coder to capture the failure as an error object.
